job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Sr. Software Engineer Job Description The Sr. Software Engineer position is accountable to deliver highest quality software for UHG/Optum next generation web-based Provider portals, applications, and solutions.  As an integral member of the technology delivery team, the Sr. Software Engineer will be a primary contributor in designing, coding, testing, debugging, documenting and supporting software applications consistent with established specifications and business requirements to deliver business value. The ideal candidate has 4+ years full-stack software engineering experience and proficiency in Microservices Architecture. Required Skills: ·         4+ years of experience with Java (Must have Java 8 or higher) ·         2+ years of Experience in Spring Boot or Spring MVC ·         2+ years of Experience in Developing Rest Services ·         2+ years of experience with Git ·         2+years of experience in Kafka ·         1+ years of experience with Dependency Injection framework ·         3+ years of experience in Microservices ·         5+ years of software development experience. ·         3+ years of experience with agile development methodologies. ·         1+ years of experience with Test-Driven Development using automated testing frameworks ·         3+ years of experience ensuring your code builds and deploys properly through Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment processes built in Jenkins. · Hadoop,Security,spring,Docker,management,architecture,Debugging,Agile,Scrum,ant,Design,Automation,Azure,Adaptability,Engineering,Shipping,Testing, Communication, SAN, Kubernetes, Business,Java,Data Structures,React
